tickle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to move your fingers gently over someone’s body in order to make them laugh
tickle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if something touching your body tickles you, it makes you want to rub your body because it is slightly uncomfortable
tickle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Mazie’s fur collar was tickling her neck.
tickle.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if a situation, remark etc tickles you, it amuses or pleases you
tickle.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The kids were tickled pink to see you on TV!
tickle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a feeling in your throat that makes you want to cough
tickle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I’ve got a tickle in my throat.
